summary: Reduces the light values of all light templates und dungeons which override them. So essentially all interiors become darker.
descriptionHtml:
I\'m with the general lighting in Skyrim completely satisfied, but as soon as the lights went out was something wrong. So I have dealt with the creation kit and found the necessary buttons to make the \"Luminous Cave\", a dark cave.
I modified all templates and overriden interior values in so far that the dark templates have been obscured by more than 90%. Brighter templates were reduced by a fixed value. 90% I found a bit steep for templates, which were apparently intended for brighter environments.

Works great with my new project \"Correct Lighting\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12762

V 1.0: Changed the brightness values of all lightning templates -> Many dungeons get darker now.

V 2.0: Changed the brightness values of all dungeons that are not using the lightning templates. -> All dungeons are now darker.
author: Mike Fox

files.name: Darker Light Templates
files.changelogHtml: Lighting templates become darker -> Many dungeons become dark(er)

files.name: Mike Foxs Darker Dungeons
files.changelogHtml: Dungeon specific lighting values reduced -> All dungeons are now dark(er)
